name: PixelTron-127
description:
Oh no, it's glitching, fix it as soon as you can!

Dash with your brand new PixelTron-127 using the arrow keys (or WASD)  but remember: you can make a new dash after you hit something or while you are falling, those glitched pixel hurt you, buttons fix the pixels (for the most) and the less you dash the more you gain.

1 level 10 rooms, how many pixels are you able to fix?

Created for Weekly Jam 127

Music Theme Battle of Pogs by Komiku
